name: Deep Sea Valentine
description:
It's Valentine's Day, and the flirtatious pink dolphin Inia is looking for a last-minute date. However, her best friend is tired of Inia settling for random strangers. She has to prove that they're a worthwhile candidate!

Can you help Inia find a date that lives up to her friend's standards?

  • 6 romanceable girls
    You're bound to find one, two, or maybe even six girls that are totally your type!
  • Half visual novel, half RPG
    Unlike most dating sims, the route you get isn't determined by dialogue choices. What you do is actually more important than what you say.
  • Vaporwave
    From the user interface to the soundtrack – everything got that A E S T H E T I C.
  • Lesbian-Approved
    I made my lesbian friend play this and she thought it was good.
